description:
Somehow, the danger is past.
Having saved some money, Jahy-sama decides to quit the pub and start her own business.
Having taken no harm, the shopping district proceeds to put on the summer festival.
Jahy-sama doens`t know what these festivals are about, but between shrine carrying, getting prizes, it seems to be an event worth participating in.
Since Kokoro is also asking, Jahy-sama decides to be a member of the shrine-carrying team of kids.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La grande Jahy ne perd jamais !
The Great Jahy Will Not Be Defeated!
ジャヒー様はくじけない!
